title: Introduction to Java
description: Learn the basics of Java programming, syntax, data types, and simple applications.

title: Control Flow and Loops
description: Understand conditional statements, loops, and exception handling in Java.

title: Object-Oriented Programming (OOP)
description: Learn OOP principles like encapsulation, inheritance, polymorphism, and abstraction.

title: Data Structures and Algorithms
description: Understand linked lists, stacks, queues, trees, and sorting/searching algorithms using Java.

title: Python Fundamentals
description: Cover basic Python syntax, loops, and functions.

title: Data Science with Python
description: Learn NumPy, Pandas, and data visualization techniques.

title: Introduction to R
description: Learn the basics of R programming, including syntax, variables, and data types.

title: Data Wrangling with R
description: Explore data manipulation techniques using dplyr and tidyr.

title: SQL Fundamentals
description: Learn basic SQL queries, data types, and database operations.

title: Working with Tables and Joins
description: Understand how to create, modify, and join tables using SQL.
